page.title: 19THE VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: The only shops in the block are situated in Marsh Gibbon,although there is a part time Post Office in Edgcott. The{butchers shop}is family owned and until recently had its own abattoir. It is used by villages all round the area. The{two general stores}are very different . One is a modern shop,opened about 20 years ago and incorporates the sub Post Office and also sells newspapers. The other shop is also family owned and the present owner has worked in the shop for nearly 50 years.The shop is fitted with many old black drawers and has a pair of old brass scales on the counter. He has had a modern weighing machine and a refrigerator installed. Both old village families and newcomers use the store.
